name: @boid-wasm-sim/wasm
description: WASM module for boid simulation using Go

scripts.build: mise exec -- env GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o boid.wasm . && cp boid.wasm ../web/main/public/
scripts.build:debug: mise exec -- env GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -gcflags='-N -l' -o boid.wasm . && cp boid.wasm ../web/main/public/
